src:
Ikut Festival Kethoprak, Target Seniman Muda Ini Tidak Muluk-Muluk
07 Nov 2019, 17:35 by Wahyu Suryo


Ikut Festival Kethoprak, Target Seniman Muda Ini Tidak Muluk-Muluk

KBRN, Yogyakarta: Kontingen dari empat kecamatan di Kota Yogyakarta, masing-masing Jetis, Mantrijeron, Keraton serta Danurejan, pada Kamis (7/11/2019), menampilkan kemampuan terbaik mereka dalam Festival Kethoprak di Auditorium RRI Jalan Affandi Gejayan.
Setiap kontingen diberi durasi waktu satu jam untuk mementaskan cerita kethoprak yang mereka bawakan, di hadapan penonton dan tiga orang dewan juri, salah satunya seniman kethoprak dari RRI Yogyakarta, Sugipman Dwi Nurseto.
Para peserta yang mayoritas masih berusia muda, tampak menghayati cerita yang mereka bawakan di atas panggung, salah satunya Fransiskus Xaverius Jesua de Amorista usia 21 tahun dari Kecamatan Jetis, yang berperan sebagai Bandung Bondowoso.
"Kami menampilkan cerita Pepesthen, tentang kisah cinta dan takdir Bandung Bondowoso, yang akhirnya dia harus mengorbankan belahan hatinya demi baktinya kepada orang tuanya," katanya usai pentas.
Sebagai seniman kethoprak berusia muda, ia merasa bangga bisa tampil dalam sebuah festival, semua ini tidak lain demi proses regenerasi, sehingga kesenian yang sudah dua tahun ia geluti, bisa tetap lestari di masa depan.
"Yang pertama pasti senang, bersyukur juga karena para pemain tidak hanya yang senior saja, tetapi yang muda juga mendapat didikan serta bimbingan sebagai pemain kethoprak," lanjut dia.
Dalam festival ini, ia dan rekan-rekannya tidak terlalu memikirkan untuk meraih juara, karena yang terpenting mendalami kesenian kethoprak bisa sebagai tempat belajar untuk nguri-uri (melestarikan, red) budaya bangsa.
"Targetnya tidak muluk-muluk, yang penting regenerasi dan bisa belajar," ujarnya.
Festival Kethoprak tingkat Kota Yogyakarta sudah dimulai sejak tanggal 4 November kemarin, ada empat kontingen kecamatan yang tampil, yaitu dari Kotagede, Gedongtengen, Pakualaman serta Gondomanan.
Kemudian tanggal 5 November, kecamatan yang tampil Umbulharjo, Tegalrejo, Wirobrajan serta Gondokusuman. Sedangkan puncak acara festival pada tanggal 8 November yang akan tampil dari Kecamatan Ngampilan serta Mergangsan.Â
text:
Joining the Kethoprak Festival, the Target of Young Artists is Not Grandiose
Nov 7 2019, 17:35 by Wahyu Suryo


Joining the Kethoprak Festival, the Target of Young Artists is Not Grandiose

KBRN, Yogyakarta: Contingents from four districts in the city of Yogyakarta, each Jetis, Mantrijeron, Keraton and Danurejan, on Thursday (11/07/2019), showed their best abilities in the Kethoprak Festival in RRI Auditorium, Jalan Affandi Gejayan.
Each contingent was given an hour's duration to stage the kethoprak story that they brought, in front of the audience and three judges, one of them was a kethoprak artist from RRI Yogyakarta, Sugipman Dwi Nurseto.
The majority of participants who were still young, seemed to live the story they brought on the stage, one of them was Francis Xaverius Jesua de Amorista, 21 years old from Jetis District, who served as Bandung Bondowoso.
"We present the story of Pepesthen, about the love story and destiny of Bandung Bondowoso, which finally he had to sacrifice his soul mate for his devotion to his parents," he said after the stage.
As a young kethoprak artist, he feels proud to be able to perform at a festival, all of this is nothing but for the regeneration process, so that the arts that he has been involved in for two years can remain sustainable in the future.
"The first one must be happy, thankful also because the players are not only senior, but the young ones also receive training and guidance as kethoprak players," he continued.
In this festival, he and his colleagues did not think too much to win the championship, because the most important thing was to explore the art of kethoprak as a place to learn to preserve the national culture.
"The target is not grandiose, what is important is regeneration and learning," he said.
Yogyakarta City Kethoprak Festival has started since November 4th yesterday, there were four sub-district contingents who appeared, namely from Kotagede, Gedongtengen, Pakualaman and Gondomanan.
Then on November 5, the districts that appeared Umbulharjo, Tegalrejo, Wirobrajan and Gondokusuman. While the highlight of the festival on November 8, which will appear from the District of Ngampil and Mergangsan.
